  • Method Details

    • determineWinner

      public BetResult determineWinner​(java.lang.Integer randomWinValue, java.util.Set<Bet> bets) throws NoBetsMadeException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, InvalidAmountException
      Determine the winner from a Set of Bets, using a given random win value;
      Specified by:
      determineWinner in interface IGameRule
      Parameters:
      randomWinValue - The closet money amount value of a bet to this random number is the winner bet. The number must be a whole number.
      bets - This set of bets that the GameRule have to choose one of them to be the winner of the game.
      Returns:
      Betresult, containing the result for the winning bet. The won amount of the BetResult can not be null or negative value.
      Throws:
      NoBetsMadeException - when no bets have been made yet.
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the random win value is not a whole number.
      InvalidAmountException - when the won money amount of the returned BetResult is 0 or negative value.
      Should:
      throwNoBetsMadeExceptionInCaseThereIsNoBetsInTheBetsList, throwIllegalArgumentExceptionIfRandomWinValueIsNotAWholeNumber, notCreateOrReturnABetResultTillTheTotalBetsIsEqualToTheGetMaxBetsPerRound, callAllTheMoneyAmountOfAllBetsInThePassedListOfBets, CreateAndReturnABetResultWithTheWinningBetAndTotalMoneyAmountOfBetsAsTheWinningMoneyAmountWhenTotalBetsIsEqualTheGetMaxBetsPerRound, returnNullInCaseTheTotalBetsAreNotEqualToTheGetMaxBetsPerRound, throwInvalidAmountExceptionInCaseTheWinningMoneyAmountIs0, throwInvalidAmountExceptionInCaseTheWinningMoneyAmountIsNegativeValue

    • getMaxBetsPerRound

      public int getMaxBetsPerRound() throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      return the maximum number of bets which are used in the calculation of the winner. The GameRule can not determine the winner if the total bets in determineWinner method are not equal to the maximum number. For now we assume 3 is the maximum number therefore, the method return 3.
      Specified by:
      getMaxBetsPerRound in interface IGameRule
      Returns:
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Should:
      returnValue3ForMaxBetsPerRound
